sourcesContent:
const About = () => { return

About



Scanning lots of photos is painful

Scanning old family photos is time consuming and boring. Scanning software is terrible, like Epson's SmartScan suite and Apple ImageCapture.

The biggest surprise to me was that scanning multiple photos at once required a preview scan, then confirmation of the photo edges, and an individual scan for each photo. This amounted to about 3 minutes to scan 3 photos, which in my mind is ridiculous.

Options for scanning lots of photos

It's a question of time and money. You can ship all your photos to companies that scan for you. I like to imagine they have a massive scanner and similar software to this. I did the math and it didn't make sense for me.



About the app

This web application is built in React with a Flask backend and image processing by Python and OpenCV.



Creator

By Tucker Bendix

; }; export default About;
